oai_dc:dc.dc:title: J.O. Gist oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gist, James O.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Excerpts of an oral history with J.O. Gist, an MTSU alumnus and former business office employee. Gist shares his memories of campus life during the 1940s and 1960s
1. G.I. Bill and campus life during the late 1940s -- 2. Dr. Melvin Scarlett's contributions to MTSU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War II; GI Bill; Campus Life; Fraternal organizations
College students; Greek letter societies; World War, 1939-1945; Middle Tennessee State College; Middle Tennessee State University
